LanguageData.Thought_Omikuji.stages.0.label: Ate Tsujiura
LanguageData.Thought_Omikuji.stages.0.description: There may not have been a fortune inside, but something tells me today will be just fine.
LanguageData.Thought_MysteriousWreath.stages.0.label: Used Lefca's Wreath
LanguageData.Thought_MysteriousWreath.stages.0.descri: I feel...lighter? My body coasts along, as I try to remember something. What was it? Hmmm...whatever, life's good, who cares?
LanguageData.Thought_NutChocolate.stages.0.label: Ate Wolvern's Gift
LanguageData.Thought_NutChocolate.stages.0.descriptio: Whatever those nuts were they seem to have numbed my tongue. Other than that, the chocolate was nice. I'll focus on the latter when I thank her.
